sentences.english: Back on Earth, in a wordless montage, Batman goes to see Vixen.
sentences.chinese: 无声的蒙太奇镜头闪回了地球，蝙蝠侠去看维克森。

sentences.english: But to bats, it's as loud as a jet airplane.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于蝙蝠来说，它们响的就像喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 一个蝙蝠粪和硫磺小球。

sentences.english: So useful to have him swooping around like an overgrown bat.
sentences.chinese: 他飞来飞去象个大蝙蝠倒是真有用。

sentences.english: A Pallas' long-tongued bat A Pallas' long-toungued bat flies through the air.
sentences.chinese: 一只帕拉斯长舌蝙蝠在空气中飞行。

sentences.english: The bat, is to take fly kind and beetle as food mainly.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠，主要是以蝇类和甲虫为食。

sentences.english: There's a black Batman shirt I really like.
sentences.chinese: 有一件黑色的蝙蝠侠T恤衫我很喜欢。

sentences.english: Bat loves scaring the others, so they decide to give him a taste of his own medicine.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠喜欢吓唬别人，所以大家想让他自食恶果一下。

sentences.english: Bats are nocturnal animal, so do owl.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠和猫头鹰都是夜行性动物。

sentences.english: The movie " batman" is the biggest block-buster movie of 1989.
sentences.chinese: 《蝙蝠侠》是1989年最有影响的大制作影片。

sentences.english: These include the giant kangaroo rat, the Indiana myosis bat, the black-footedferret and the hog deer.
sentences.chinese: 包括长鼻袋鼠，印第安缩瞳蝙蝠，黑足鼬以及豚鹿。

sentences.english: The other vampire bats came around and asked him how he got so much blood.
sentences.chinese: 其他吸血蝙蝠围过来，问他怎么得到这么多血。

sentences.english: The heart such as bat suspected, it always takes off in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 猜疑之心犹如蝙蝠，它总是在黄昏中起飞。

sentences.english: Some are strewed with peonies, bats and other auspicious patterns to bring the owner good fortune.
sentences.chinese: 一些散落的牡丹，蝙蝠等吉祥图案带来好运气的人。

sentences.english: Why the squirrel would want to kill the bat is a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 为什么这只松鼠想要杀死那只蝙蝠是一个谜。

definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
vulture/(bird species of China) griffon vulture (Gyps fulvus)
